I want sanctions to be cut, we all have our rights to say no to mandatory work especially if we have our own ways looking for work.
The reason i want this petition to be sucessful because i feel the people in the work programmes dont do their jobs properly and they seem to tell job centre you have not turned up when you have or when you have an interview and you give them notice but still they think it is ok to send a report knowing you have given a good reason which is wrong.
The department for work and pensions will sanction you up to 3 years expecting you to live off air without giving you hardship payments knowing those on benefits are living in poverty like myself i think this is unfair the government just want one world order where all the rich people live lavish lives whilst we struggle and work like slaves.

Please sign my petition !
